post.summary: Create Order: Rest of the World
post.description: This API takes the shipment details, drop information, pickup information and creates an order with specified carrier partner. This applies for shipments created and transported within North America, Europe, Middle East and South-East Asia and cross-border shipments.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username, unique to the enterprise profile

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Unique key to verify/authenticate the enterprise profile

get.summary: Fetch Order Details: Rest of the World
get.description: Given an AWB and a carrier partner ID, fetch details of a shipment placed with that AWB. Works for shipments created and transported within North America, Europe, Middle East and South-East Asia and all cross-border shipments. Especially useful when an async order is placed with the V4 API.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the customer

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Unique license key provided by Clickpost for the enterprise, used for authentication

parameters.name: awb
parameters.description: AWB of the order to receive details for

parameters.name: cp_id
parameters.description: Partner ID of the courier responsible for delivering the shipment

post.description: Register an AWB for tracking updates with Clickpost, given the AWB number, carrier partner ID, shipment information, pick-up and drop information, and additional details as input.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key that was provided by Clickpost

shipment_info.drop_address: Roots hacker Home, R 28, Second Floor, Nehru Enclace, Opposite Nehru Place, New Delhi 110001

oneOf.title: Inactive/Non-existent Account or Courier Partner ID

message.example: Ops! Internal server error in Clickpost

get.description: Cancellation API allows you to cancel the shipment in the carrier partner's system

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the Clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: API key given to enterprise by the Clickpost team

parameters.name: waybill
parameters.description: Air Waybill of the order

parameters.name: cp_id
parameters.description: Carrier Partner ID of the carrier

parameters.name: account_code
parameters.description: Courier partner account name configured on the Clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: manually_update_status
parameters.description: If the value of this field is "True" then Clickpost will update the tracking status of AWB to "Cancelled" manually once a successful response is received from the courier partner.

oneOf.title: Account does not exist/Invalid carrier partner

message.example: Invalid Waybill/ Waybill cannot be cancelled

get.description: This API enables customers to retrieve feedback from end-users in case of failure of delivery of any shipment. Users can update their preferred location of delivery at Clickpost Tracking Page, and those changes are retrieved by this API.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: API key given to enterprise by the clickpost onboarding team

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Epoch time (in secs) of start of the period in which the feedbacks were provided

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Epoch time (in secs) of end of the period in which the feedbacks were provided

post.description: This API instructs the courier company to take action on an AWB. Using this API, enterprises can Reattempt the shipment with the updated address, preferred delivery date, and phone number. Enterprises can also Initiate a Return to Origin

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Enter the username of the Clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the Clickpost team

RAW_BODY.default: {     "action": "INITIATE_RTO / REATTEMPT",     "waybill": "4152912745934",     "cp_id": 4,     "account_code": "Delhivery-Express",      "address":"Updated Address details",     "landmark": "Updated Address landmark if any",     "drop_pincode": "Updated pincode",     "phone_number":"8080808080",     "preferred_date": "2022-05-13" }

get.description: With help of this API enterprises can get all the carrier partner accounts that are currently active on their Clickpost dashboard. This API would be useful if the enterprise is not using Clickpost's allocation rules and just require the active list of accounts to assign the carrier manually

parameters.description: API key given to enterprise by the clickpost onboarding team

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether enterprise wants to fetch all active courier partner accounts or not

oneOf.title: Value must be either True or False

message.example: ['“Tru” value must be either True or False.']

post.description:
Our recommendation API helps you decide amongst your available Carrier Partners, the best, most efficient and dependable choice of delivery for any given package.

It makes these decisions based on historical data on deliveries, delays and other internal parameters in the user-specified location.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the clickpost onboarding team

post.summary: Fetch Recommended Carriers: Rest of the World and Cross Border
post.description:
Our recommendation API helps you decide amongst your available Carrier Partners, the best, most efficient and dependable choice of delivery for any given package.

It makes these decisions based on historical data on deliveries, delays and other internal parameters in the user-specified location.

This API can be used for shipments in the GCC, North America, and European Countries.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the clickpost onboarding team

get.description:
Fetch shipment security key API give the security key for each shipment that you can consume and store corresponding to a shipment in the system.

This security key is useful if you have the security feature enabled on Clickpost's tracking page. If the security feature is enabled on your Clickpost tracking page, you need to ensure you consume the shipment security key and pass it in URL param key= while rendering the tracking page at your end.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: API key given to enterprise by the clickpost onboarding team

parameters.name: waybill
parameters.description: Airway bill number for which the security key needs to be fetched

parameters.name: cp_id
parameters.description: Carrier Partner ID (https://track.clickpost.in/courier_partner)

post.description: The WhatsApp opt-in API allows you to inform Clickpost systems if WhatsApp communication shall be enabled/disabled for a particular shipment.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Unique license key of the customer, used for authentication

get.description: The API retrieves the latest shipment tracking status updates between the specified start and end time. This API takes the start date and end date and returns the data for all the AWBs which were updated during this time period

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the clickpost onboarding team

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Clickpost API Username: Provided by Clickpost Team

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: start time in epoch (seconds). Example: 1616580960

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: end time in epoch (seconds). Difference between start time and end time cannot be greater than 1800 seconds(30 mins)

get.description: The Return Polling Delta API is used to fetch all the return requests raised in the Clickpost system in a 60 minute window. This can be considered as a fallback mechanism to the Return Request Received Webhook mentioned above that is already in place to share this data.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the clickpost onboarding team

parameters.name: user_name
parameters.description: Username of the Enterprise given Clickpost team

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time for which the returns needs to be retrieved

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time for which the returns needs to be retrieved

get.summary: Pincode to City and State API
get.description: The API takes the 6 digit Indian pincode and returns the corresponding city and state

parameters.name: pincode
parameters.description: valid 6 digit Indian pincode

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Clickpost API Key

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Clickpost account username: you ll get it from your Clickpost relationship manager

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Unique API key for your Clickpost account. Will be shared by your Clickpost relationship manager

parameters.name: waybill
parameters.description: Unique airway bill number or tracking ID provided by the carrier for the shipment

parameters.name: cp_id
parameters.description: Clickpost's Courier Partner ID: https://track.clickpost.in/courier_partner

parameters.name: regenerate
parameters.description: Will always be false if you wish to fetch earlier generated label. If you pass regenerate=true, Clickpost systems will try to fetch the label again from carriers and share it [Not recommended]. Always pass regenerate=false unless recommended by your Clickpost relationship manager

message.example: Ops! Internal server error in Clickpost
Authentication Failed: Invalid Token or API Key

post.description: This API allows you to generate an access token using a username and password

password.description: Password of the user of the enterprise account
